exclusion.criterion: Patient's guardian refusal to participate in the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a candidate for laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia. Computed Tomography of the abdomen with contrast shows the presence of a distended appendix with thickened appendiceal wall without perforation, abscess or gangrene.
